Posts.EditableText: The same with me kind.... of whan i press the button it says "Error loading, Whatever the game is called- file association does not exsist or is incomplete" so everytime i want to try my game I have to go to Quest Pro and load it from there. Alex, what is going on :?::?: I'm sad and angry . HELP :!::!::!::(:(:cry::cry:
Posts.HTML: The same with me kind.... of whan i press the button it says "Error loading, Whatever the game is called- file association does not exsist or is incomplete" so everytime i want to try my game I have to go to Quest Pro and load it from there. Posts.EditableText: Go to the Quest Options window and click the "Restore File Associations" button.
Posts.HTML: Go to the Quest Options window and click the "Restore File Associations" button.

Posts.EditableText: Worked like a charm.
Posts.HTML: Worked like a charm.
